item.title: Wilson (Weixin) Cai
item.description:
I am a second year graduate student in Biostatistics Department at UC Berkeley and I am fortunate to be advised by Professors Mark van der Laan and Alan Hubbard. My research interests lie in Statistical Machine Learning and Causal Inference. Prior to Berkeley, I obtained a Bachelors (B.Sc.) degree in Statistics and double major in Finance from Univeristy of Hong Kong.

Here is the latest version of my CV.
